titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْإِمَامَ لَا يَغْسِلُهُ إِلَّا إِمَامٌ مِنَ الْأَئِمَّةِ ( عليهم السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 92 – The Imam<sup>asws</sup> is such that none can wash him<sup>asws</sup> (funeral wash) except an Imam<sup>asws</sup> from the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْإِمَامَ لَا يَغْسِلُهُ إِلَّا إِمَامٌ مِنَ الْأَئِمَّةِ ( عليهم السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 92 – The Imam<sup>asws</sup> is such that none can wash him<sup>asws</sup> (funeral wash) except an Imam<sup>asws</sup> from the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ عُمَرَ الْحَلَّالِ أَوْ غَيْرِهِ عَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قُلْتُ لَهُ إِنَّهُمْ يُحَاجُّونَّا يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ الْإِمَامَ لَا يَغْسِلُهُ إِلَّا الْإِمَامُ قَالَ فَقَالَ مَا يُدْرِيهِمْ مَنْ غَسَلَهُ فَمَا قُلْتَ لَهُمْ قَالَ فَقُلْتُ جُعِلْتُ فِدَاكَ قُلْتُ لَهُمْ إِنْ قَالَ مَوْلَايَ إِنَّهُ غَسَلَهُ تَحْتَ عَرْشِ رَبِّي فَقَدْ صَدَقَ وَ إِنْ قَالَ غَسَلَهُ فِي تُخُومِ الْأَرْضِ فَقَدْ صَدَقَ قَالَ لَا هَكَذَا قَالَ فَقُلْتُ فَمَا أَقُولُ لَهُمْ قَالَ قُلْ لَهُمْ إِنِّي غَسَلْتُهُ فَقُلْتُ أَقُولُ لَهُمْ إِنَّكَ غَسَلْتَهُ فَقَالَ نَعَمْ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali Al Washha, from Ahmad Bin Umar Al Hallal, or someone else, 
(It has been narrated) from Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘I said to him<sup>asws</sup>, ‘They are arguing against us saying that the Imam<sup>asws</sup> is such that none can wash him<sup>asws</sup> (for funeral) except for (another) Imam<sup>asws</sup>. What would make them know who washed him<sup>asws</sup>? So what did you say to them?’ So I said, ‘May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>! I said to them, ‘If my Master<sup>asws</sup> says that he<sup>asws</sup> washed him (7<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) beneath the Throne of my Lord<sup>azwj</sup>, so he<sup>asws</sup> has spoken the truth, and if he<sup>asws</sup> says that he<sup>asws</sup> washed him<sup>asws</sup> in the surrounding of the earth, so he<sup>asws</sup> has spoken the truth’. 
He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Not like this’. So I said, ‘So what should I be saying to them?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Say to them that I<sup>asws</sup> washed him (7<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>)’. So I said, ‘Shall I say to them that you<sup>asws</sup> washed him<sup>asws</sup>?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes’. (Note – the 7<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup> passed away at Baghdad while 8<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup> was in Madina - hence the questioning).

verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ جُمْهُورٍ قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا أَبُو مَعْمَرٍ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْإِمَامِ يَغْسِلُهُ الْإِمَامُ قَالَ سُنَّةُ مُوسَى بْنِ عِمْرَانَ ( عليه السلام ) .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Hamhour who said, ‘Abu Ma’mar narrated to us saying, 
‘I asked Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup> about the Imam<sup>asws</sup> washing the Imam<sup>asws</sup>. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Sunnah of Musa<sup>as</sup> Bin Imran<sup>as</sup>’.

verses.text: وَ عَنْهُ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ جُمْهُورٍ عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ طَلْحَةَ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِلرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) إِنَّ الْإِمَامَ لَا يَغْسِلُهُ إِلَّا الْإِمَامُ فَقَالَ أَ مَا تَدْرُونَ مَنْ حَضَرَ لِغُسْلِهِ قَدْ حَضَرَهُ خَيْرٌ مِمَّنْ غَابَ عَنْهُ الَّذِينَ حَضَرُوا يُوسُفَ فِي الْجُبِّ حِينَ غَابَ عَنْهُ أَبَوَاهُ وَ أَهْلُ بَيْتِهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
And from him, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Jamhour, from Yunus, from Talha who said, 
‘I said to Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup>, ‘The Imam<sup>asws</sup> is such that none can wash him<sup>asws</sup> (for funeral) except (another) Imam<sup>asws</sup>?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘What would make you know who was present for his<sup>asws</sup> washing? (The ones who) had attended it were better than those who were absent from it. Those who attended Yusuf<sup>as</sup> in the well when his<sup>as</sup> parents and his<sup>as</sup> family were absent from him<sup>as</sup>’.
